responses.rationale: Factual report of rare human infection and condition for occurrence. No explicit framing cues.
'hitting the market' is an idiom describing background condition. Factual report of market impact and causes.
Factual report of historical events and spread. 'large outbreaks' is a factual description of scale.
Factual report of case locations and flock types. No explicit framing cues.
Factual report of consequences (restrictions, blocking exports). No explicit framing cues.
Factual report of consequences (limited purchases) and cause (outbreak). No explicit framing cues.
Factual report of consequences (banning/limiting imports) and cause (outbreak). No explicit framing cues.
'hitting the country' is an idiom describing background condition. Factual report of market impact and causes.
Factual report of detection locations, dates, and flock types. No explicit framing cues.
Factual report of detection location, date, and flock type. No explicit framing cues.
'hitting the market' is an idiom describing background condition. Factual report of market impact and causes.
Factual identification of strain (technical term) and relation. No explicit framing cues.
Factual report of geographic spread and timeline. No explicit framing cues.
Factual report of status (pending test results). No explicit framing cues.
'dealing with' is an idiom describing a condition. Factual report of situation in other regions.
Factual report of lack of information. No explicit framing cues.
'fear is driven by' describes public reaction, not threat impact. Neutral per context guard.
'hit with' is an idiom. Factual report of confirmation, date, location, and significance.
'hit with' is an idiom. Factual report of confirmation, date, location, and flock types.
Factual description of transmission method and timing. No explicit framing cues.
Factual report of lack of information about a procedure. No explicit framing cues.
Factual report of economic consequence (downturn) and cause. No explicit framing cues.
Factual listing of case types and locations. No explicit framing cues.
Factual report about an article update and infection fact. No explicit framing cues.
Factual report of confirmation, location, and type of flu (HPAI is technical term).
Factual report of finding location and type of flu (HPAI is technical term).
Factual report of detection and statement of likely potential threat. No explicit amplification.
Factual description of symptoms in infected birds, attributed to source. No explicit framing.
A question about a potential severe action (culling millions). Not a statement of realised harm.
Factual description of a potential transmission route. No explicit framing cues.
Factual description of a potential transmission route, attributed to experts. No explicit framing.
A question about mitigation actions. No explicit framing cues.
Quote reporting factual observation about geographic spread comparison. No explicit framing.
Factual report of consequence (halted imports) and cause (outbreak). No explicit framing cues.
Factual report of status (not unexpected) and context (previous outbreaks). No explicit framing.
Factual description of symptoms. 'sudden increase in mortality' is factual description.
'raised concerns' describes public reaction, not threat impact. Neutral per context guard.
A question about comparison of outbreaks. No explicit framing cues.
A question about a potential consequence (price increase). No explicit framing cues.
Factual report of findings, locations, and flock types, attributed to source. No explicit framing.
Factual report of detection and preceding events/locations. No explicit framing cues.
Factual report of detection location and type of flock, attributed to source. No explicit framing.
Factual report of detection location and type of flu ('highly pathogenic' is technical term).
Factual report of positive test and location/type of flock. No explicit framing cues.
Factual report of status (awaiting results) and potential location. No explicit framing cues.
Factual report of lack of disclosure. No explicit framing cues.
Factual report of detection, location, and flock type, attributed to source. No explicit framing.
Factual description of a characteristic ('high mortality rates' is factual description).
'reigniting fears' describes public reaction, not threat impact. Neutral per context guard.
Factual report of confirmation, source, and location. No explicit framing cues.
Factual report of confirmation, location, and type of farm. No explicit framing cues.
'concerning' describes a status/reaction, not threat impact. No explicit framing cues.
Factual report of a past event (rare case, location). No explicit framing cues.
Factual description of illness severity range ('severe' is factual description). No explicit framing.
Factual report of a finding about transmission, attributed to source. No explicit framing.
Factual description of transmission method. No explicit framing cues.
Factual description of transmission methods, attributed to source. No explicit framing.
Factual description of transmission method. No explicit framing cues.
Factual report of characteristic (can cross species) and status (rare). 'rare' is factual description.
Factual report of status (origin not known) and characteristic ('significant role' is factual description).
Factual report of a past event (outbreak, locations) and consequence. No explicit framing cues.
